QuestData.Title: Frostmourne
QuestData.Description: We must press on, hero. We've come so far... we're so close to our goal.$B$BI must delay a moment to send Elandra back to the airship. I'm uncertain how we're going to escape with so many men lost and so few to keep our path in secure.$B$BContinue on. I will meet you in the Halls of Reflection.
QuestData.LogDescription: Meet Lady Jaina Proudmoore at the entrance to the Halls of Reflection.
QuestData.RewardText: The Halls of Reflection. Finally.$B$BLet me know when you are ready. Arthas may not be here, but it would be naive to think that he would leave Frostmourne unguarded entirely.
